summary: Adds Coal as a mine-able item.  Can Mine Coal by a 70% chance from all mining nodes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yTt8Il0.png[/IMG][/center]

This mod adds coal as a mine-able resource to all mining nodes. You can then take that coal to a smelter with an Iron ore and make Steel.

-There are some mods that allow you to make Steel using charcoal and making charcoal from a piece of firewood. I find it a bit too easy. This will allow you a chance to get the materials for coal to make Steel.

-Why should you use this mod? Since Steel is such low quality compared to orichalcum or ebony.
As a modder, I see a lot of mods which add new weapons to the "Steel" crafting section. And some of those weapons are pretty potent. This just adds a little more immersion.

-Corundum, realistically corundum doesn't exist like it does in Tamriel. It's more of an Aluminum crystal sort of speak.

This is a beta, I can't 100% confirm that the coal can be found on all Mining Nodes, I will say it is 100% on nodes that produce Gems. So if it gives a gem it gives coal.

Know any other uses for Coal?

I am curious what else I can make coal a use for in Skyrim besides coking steel. Let me know in the comments and I will consider your suggestion.
